alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 3:53PM EST until December 19 at 3:43AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Souhegan River At Milford affecting Hillsborough County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Souhegan River at Milford. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, Water begins to flood a portion of Route 101A in Milford. Water begins to flood the property of the Milford water utilites department, properties on Intervale Road in Wilton, and the Monadnock Water parking lot. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 PM EST Monday the stage was 9.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:45 PM EST Monday was 9.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 6.2 feet early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
